Class ActionRotateExtrude

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.scadjvm.SCADObject
      • ch.pschatzmann.scadjvm.d3.Object3D

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAppendSCAD, java.io.Serializable
    public class ActionRotateExtrude
extends Object3D
    Rotational extrusion spins a 2D shape around the Z-axis to form a solid which has rotational symmetry.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
